task.title: Add the glossary term to the glossary map

prereq.p: Your publication needs to contain a glossary map. If this is not the case yet, add a ditamap to your publication.You can give this ditamap any name you like, but for clarity’s sake, we suggest you call it _Glossary.

step.cmd: Open the _Glossary ditamap in the DITA Maps Manager.
Right-click the _Glossary ditamap and select Append child Glossary Reference… .
Select your newly created glossentry topic.

step.stepresult: Oxygen adds the topic to the _Glossaryditamap as a <glossref> but gives an error message that the <glossref> needs a key.

step.cmd: Open the publication or the _Glossary ditamap in the Author window.
Fill out its keys attribute in the Attributes window.
step.stepresult: You can give this keys attribute any name you like, but for clarity’s sake, we suggest you give it the same name as its <glossterm> or title.
